name: MimicKissingHold

restraintStruggle: [TargetName] tries to pull free of the myriad of unnaturally pale hands holding [TargetHimOrHer] in place to break away from the lusty mimic swapping saliva with [TargetHimOrHer]...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] weakly tries to pull free of the myriad of unnaturally pale hands holding [TargetHimOrHer] in place to break away from the lusty mimic swapping saliva with [TargetHimOrHer], even though [TargetHeOrShe] wants nothing more than to lean into the deep kiss...
restraintEscaped: [TargetName] manages to shake off [AttackerName]'s many armed-hold while she gazes into [TargetHisOrHer] eyes, licking [AttackerHisOrHer] lips with a longing sigh before seamlessly resuming the passionate makeout session.
restraintEscapedFail: Despite [TargetName]'s best efforts, [AttackerName]'s countless unearthly hands keep a firm hold on [TargetHisOrHer] body, slowly pulling [TargetHimOrHer] closer and closer to the abyss while [AttackerHeOrShe] lovingly rolls [AttackerHisOrHer] long tongue around [TargetHisOrHer] mouth.

But just as [TargetName] starts to break the combined hold of the many unearthly hands wrapped around [TargetHimOrHer], [AttackerName] leans forward with a hungry purr, keeping her lips firmly locked against [TargetHisOrHer]s while [AttackerHeOrShe] lovingly assaults [TargetHisOrHer] mouth with her unnaturally long flexible tongue!

However, as [TargetName] is trying to focus on breaking away from [AttackerName]'s ravenous makeout, a wave of enticing dark magic flows from [AttackerHisOrHer] tongue to [TargetHisOrHer], making [TargetHimOrHer] pleasurably space out, leaving [TargetHimOrHer] without resistance as [AttackerName] pulls [TargetHimOrHer] back into the kiss with a predatory coo.
